author: Thomas Hale, Thomas Hale
title: Cooperation is key to fighting a pandemic – that's why I helped create a global coronavirus tracker
description: To defeat the virus, governments need to take a strictly evidence-based approach to learn rapidly from all countries' experience. That will require cooperation and coordination.
content: Governments across the world have responded in radically different ways to the COVID-19 crisis. Some are denying its seriousness. Some are blaming others. More and more are enacting restrictions on personal freedoms that are without precedent in peacetime. To… [+3911 chars]
